snippet: The so-called G train sprint, wrought by a line whose trains are too short for its platforms, may finally be approaching extinction.
abstract: Metropolitan Transportation Authority pledges to eradicate so-called G train sprint, wrought by a line whose trains are too short for its platforms; remedies will include designation of consistent stopping points along G train platforms, signs in each station instructing riders where to stand and relocation of benches to align with stopping points.
lead_paragraph: The so-called G train sprint, wrought by a line whose trains are too short for its platforms, may finally be approaching extinction.

headline.main: M.T.A. Will End Mystery of Where on the Platform the G Train Stops
headline.print_headline: M.T.A. Will End Mystery Of Where the G Train Stops
